Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about our services.

What is your typical process for a new project?

Our process typically includes discovery, planning, design, development, testing, and launch phases. We work closely with you throughout each stage to ensure your vision is realized.

How long does it take to complete a website?

Project timelines vary depending on complexity. A simple website might take 4-6 weeks, while more complex projects can take 3-6 months. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

Do you offer website maintenance services?

Yes, we offer ongoing maintenance packages to keep your website secure, up-to-date, and performing optimally. These can be tailored to your specific needs.

What is your payment structure?

We typically require a 50% deposit to begin work, with the remaining balance due upon project completion. For larger projects, we may establish a milestone-based payment schedule.
